REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2196 reute r f BC-UNI-MARTS-<IMMA.O>-AC 06-01 0048

TEXT.TITLE: UNI-MARTS <IMMA.O> ACQUIRES GAS-N-ALL STORES
TEXT.BODY: Uni Marts Inc said it acquired seven <Gas-N-All Inc> convenience stores for an undisclosed amount of cash. The acquisition bring to 228 the number of convenience stores owned by Uni-Marts, the company said. Reuter
